fields.label: Activate payments
fields.help: Activate payments with the PayGreen module.

behavior_payment_refused.label: Action following a failed payment
behavior_payment_refused.help: Define the behavior of the PayGreen module when a payment fail.

visibility.label: Module's visibility
visibility.help: Allows the administrator to test the module before activating it for his clients.

behavior_transmit_refund.label: Synchronize refunds
behavior_transmit_refund.help: If you activate this option, then as soon as you make a refund from the back office of your shop, a notification will be automatically sent to the PayGreen server in order to proceed with the refund of the transaction.

behavior_transmit_delivering.label: Synchronize delivery confirmations
behavior_transmit_delivering.help: If you activate this option, then as soon as an order payable on delivery is marked as 'completed', a notification will be automatically sent to the PayGreen server in order to validate the payment.

behavior_display_footer.label: Display PayGreen security logo
behavior_display_footer.help: If this option is activated, the PayGreen security logo will be displayed in the bottom of your website.

success_payment_text.label: Displayed text after a successful payment
success_payment_text.help: This message is displayed after customers finalized a payment.

failure_payment_text.label: Displayed text after a unsuccessful payment
failure_payment_text.help: This message is displayed after customers failed to validate a payment.

canceled_payment_text.label: Text displayed when canceling an order
canceled_payment_text.help: This message is displayed when a customer cancels his payment.

regenerate_cart.label: Regenerate cart if payment is cancelled
regenerate_cart.help: If this option is activated and a customer cancels his payment, his cart vill be regenerated.

detailed_logs.label: Activate detailed logs
detailed_logs.help: Detailed logs can provoke important disk space usage. This setting musn't be modified without the agreement of the PayGreen support.

behavior_iss.label: Activate distant access for PayGreen support
behavior_iss.help: If this option is activated, PayGreen support can analyze and fix your module remotely.

errors.processing_form: An error occurred while processing config form.
errors.display_form: An error occurred while building config form.
